arguments.name: X_range
arguments.description: The range of numeric values of x with which there are associated probabilities.

arguments.name: Prob_range
arguments.description: A set of probabilities associated with values in x_range.

arguments.name: Lower_limit
arguments.description: The lower bound on the value for which you want a probability.

arguments.name: Upper_limit
arguments.description: The optional upper bound on the value for which you want a probability.
